title: New heart valve aimed at high-risk patients

title_detail.value: New heart valve aimed at high-risk patients

summary: Researchers have created the first-ever nanocomposite biomaterial heart-valve developed to reduce or eliminate complications related to heart transplants. By using a newly developed technique, the researchers were able to build a more durable valve that enables the heart to adapt faster and more seamlessly.
